attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister,			   11th March 2007
	We are this year remembering the 200th anniversary of the courageous morality of William Wilberforce who persaded Parliament to stop the iniquitous slave trade.

	Next Wednesday, you will have the chance to be forever remembered as the man who stopped the futile delusion of national nuclear power.   PLEASE lead the way to stop this mad aim and ensure your legacy for the rest of history.

	It is useless and arrogant to exhort others to do without when we cling on to such weapons.  Example speaks louder than  words.
       Hazel Chesterman-Phillips (Author)

(020 8959 7040 ) (email:hazelc-p@tiscali.co,uk)
